item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #552
item.description: I hope it works out!! Also I need to chat with my mentor about if my current mathematics skill is sufficient for university. There are different kinds of math in Dutch schools, you have Math A; which is more story / scenario based and considered “easier”. And Math B; which has more complex topics and uses more formulas and such and is thus considered more complex.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #551
item.description: And omg I got an email from my college that says I could already start working on higher education mathematics way before the official school year starts. So it’s basically doing harder schoolwork while in college to skip the entire subject when I’m going to higher education.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #517
item.description: I can totally understand why some people would be content with a job like this, and I wouldn’t mind doing it as a side job. But having this be my primary source of income wouldn’t be worth it unless I’m getting paid really well.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #516
item.description: Just hang in there, my current apprenticeship is a nice workplace, yes, and I have lots of freedom, yes, but I am just not a fan of not being to utilise my full potential. It feels soul crushing to keep doing this and I hope to do actual useful things. I know it sounds derogatory but I really don’t mean it that way.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #488
item.description: I am writing a simple parser for Apple Health export data. I had to allocate 8GBs(!!!) of RAM to the application else it would run out. This is because I don't use an XML stream but a full XML parser for a 300MB XML file.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #478
item.description:
Work makes me really tired. I can’t keep up with this.

I’ve signed up for a math exam next week. I’ll be taking the test 3 years early. I did the previous year’s exam as a test to see how much I know already. And I scored 68/100 without knowing anything about what I should know for the exam.

I am willing to take the risk as I’ve made notes on what I should study, and honestly, it’s not difficult at all.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #477
item.description: There has been a medication I've been taking which causes me a lot of side effects in the evening. I've considered talking to my psychiatrist and hope to get off them. I've been using it for a year but so much has changed that I am unsure if not taking them will improve my life.
